Name: Dry Martini (15:5 dumped) Franklin
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of 2 skewered Fragata Green Olives .
STRAIN and discard excess to leave the glass and ice coated with vermouth.
Pour gin and orange bitters over vermouth-coated ice and STIR .
Review: A (roughly 15:5 ratio "dumped") Dry Martini named after Franklin Roosevelt and garnished with two olives.
History: There is considerable debate around the origin of the Martini and the best way to make this drink. Detailed information can be found on our Dry Martini page.
Nutrition: One serving of Dry Martini (15:5 dumped) Franklin contains 183 calories
